Header: Parliamentary privileges to newly appointed Prime Minister
Content: Speaker Karu Jayasuriya had agreed to provide parliamentary privileges to newly appointed Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa. The Speaker has taken this decision following an intimation made to him by President Maithripala Sirisena. A meeting between the President and the Speaker was held yesterday. Several matters were discussed at this meeting. The President drew the attention of the Speaker for the provision of facilities accorded to the new Prime Minister within Parliament. The Speaker had mentioned that officials in Parliament were working in accordance to the gazette notification issued by the President on the appointment of a new Prime Minister.
